title: Unassisted Photoelectrochemical Hydrogen Peroxide Production over MoOx-Supported Mo on Cu3BiS3 Photocathode
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00741G, Paper
Subin Moon, Young Sun Park, Hyungsoo Lee, Wooyong Jeong, Eunji Kwon, Jeongyoub Lee, Juwon Yun, Soobin Lee, Jun Hwan Kim, Seungho Yu, Jooho Moon
Hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) represents a valuable chemical compound and promising energy source owing to its high energy density comparable, with that of compressed H2. However, its production predominantly relies on...
